resources.string: I really mean that - thank you so much for using this app and volunteering to collect data for my project. Hopefully, you\'ll be part of something that has a real-world impact, but there\'s more to it than that: what I\'m trying to build is pretty ambitious, and it will only work if I can collect lots of real-world data. Without you this project would be going nowhere, so I really mean it when I say \'thank you\'!
Yes, that\'s right - prizes! Three volunteers will be selected at the end of this project (31st March, 2017) to win a £20 Amazon voucher each! Full details: http://easymaps.markormesher.co.uk.

Use the button at the top to enable scanning whenever you\'re travelling on the London Underground and disable it when you finish your journey. The scanner will run in the background, so you don\'t need to keep the app open.
Don\'t worry if you forget to turn the scanner on before you start travelling! You can turn it on and off at any point, above ground or below.

Every 20-30 seconds whilst it\'s enabled, the app checks which WiFi networks are visible and records their IDs. This app also records a unique, anonymous ID for your device, which cannot be traced to your individual identity. That\'s all it collects - no personal data, no location data, nothing that can identify you, etc. You can see your ID by opening the app menu and tapping \'Display User ID\'.

If you want to withdraw from this project can do so by simply stopping your use of this app (and uninstalling it if you wish). If you also want to withdraw the data that you\'ve generated so far, you can do so anonymously from the app menu.
If you want to contact me for any reason, you can do so from the app menu - just tap \'Contact Mark\'. If anything went wrong, tap \'Send Bug Report\' in the menu.
King\'s College London University Research Ethics Committee Reference: LRU–16/17–3924
Your user ID was also copied to your clipboard
The report was also copied to your clipboard

Please feel free to send me questions, bug reports, suggestions, general comments, etc.

---
%s

Remember, your data is completely anonymous and cannot be traced back to you.

If you tap \'Yes\' below your ID will be sent to the server, triggering the deletion of your data within 48 hours. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to withdraw your data?
Your data will be deleted within 48 hours.
